subject: Tennis
Australian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Nadal could face Andy Murray or Roger Federer in the semifinals, while Novak Djokovic, the defending champion, has third-seeded David Ferrer in his half of the draw.
snippet: Top-seeded Nadal could face Andy Murray or Roger Federer in the semifinals, while Novak Djokovic, the defending champion, has third-seeded David Ferrer in his half of the draw.
